title: Tom Cruise daughter Suri pictured out with mum Katie Holmes
text:
Katie and Suri enjoyed a girls day out (Picture: Backgrid)

It looks like Suri Cruise has some pretty good taste in books.

The 13-year-old was pictured carrying a copy of Margaret Atwood’s The Handmaid’s Tale as she headed out and about with mum Katie Holmes.

While reviews online recommend that the book be given to readers over the age of 16, due to the violence and dystopian horror in the plot, it seems Katie deemed the book appropriate for her teenage daughter.

Suri – dressed in leggings and a pink hoodie – looked pretty excited to get to reading as she ran ahead of her mother, who wore a long navy coat over jeans and a white t-shirt.

Suri – the daughter of Katie, 40, and her ex-husband Tom Cruise, 57 – clutched the book as she and her mum went to visit a friend in Manhattan.

Suri held a copy of The Handmaid’s Tale (Picture: Skyler2018 / BACKGRID)

Katie, on the other hand, held onto her coffee (Picture: Backgrid)

While Suri was bouncing around, Dawson’s Creek star Katie wasn’t as chipper, as she covered up in sunglasses and held onto a cup of coffee.

Relatable AF.

This comes after Mission Impossible star Tom was pictured on a rare outing with his son Connor.

The actor beamed away as he headed to a helipad in London – well, how else does an action hero travel – with his 24-year-old son.

Suri is now 13 years old (Picture: T.JACKSON / BACKGRID)

Tom hasn’t been seen publicly with Suri since 2013 (Picture: MJ Kim/Getty Images)

Tom adopted Connor and Isabella, now 26, in the 90s with then-wife Nicole Kidman, with the kids choosing to stay with Cruise after the high profile couple divorced in 2001.

Connor and Isabella have stayed in Scientology with their dad, with Nicole saying: ‘They have made the choice to be Scientologists and as a mother, it’s my job to love them.’

While Cruise is still close to his eldest kids, the Top Gun star hasn’t been seen publicly with daughter Suri since 2013, when she was seven years old.

Katie welcomed Suri with Mission Impossible star Tom in April 2006, with the couple getting married in November of the same year.

However, the pair split in 2012, with Tom not being pictured with the family since 2013.
